metadata.Title: CVE-2017-9432 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium.
metadata.Description:
Document Liberation Project libstaroffice before 2017-04-07 has an out-of-bounds write caused by a stack-based buffer overflow related to the DatabaseName::read function in lib/StarWriterStruct.cxx.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-9432` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

libstaroffice-0.0-0 - 0.0.5-1
libstaroffice-tools - 0.0.5-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: libstaroffice package in bionic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '0.0.5-1').
